channel.title: Open Source Contributions on Arjun Krishna
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source Contributions on Arjun Krishna

item.title: Cyclical Learning Rate (CLR)
item.description: Worked and experimented with CLR algorithm which is implemented in Keras that uses cyclical learning rates to train deep neural networks.

item.title: Text detection in natural scenes
item.description: Proposed a combination of MSER(Maximally Stable Extremal Regions) detection followed by SWT(Stroke Width Transform) to improve the accuracy of text localization.
